title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Context-Based Adaptive Expertise Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Core scientific knowledge and job-related basic professional competencies
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world work cases to develop problem-solving strategies that integrate existing knowledge with new approaches.
Learners can propose and evaluate two or more creative solutions in complex scientific problem situations.
Learners can submit deliverables applying knowledge acquired through team-based projects to real work contexts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
